page.title: 04CASTLEDERG SECONDARY SCHOOL.
page.content: In a small town called Castlederg all those 25 years ago. The rural Castlederg area was revolutionized with the building of a new Â£125,000 Secondary School. School transport was introduced in the Sixties because we are such a rural area. They used to parked in the school grounds outside the gym hall until they were bombed in August,1972. A 50-100 pound bomb wrecked three buses and damaged six. The school today has over 470 pupils, with 29 teachers, a youth tutor and a{HEADMASTER}Mr John Dunbar MBE.
